entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
